Note: Translating the immediately preceding Latin verses.
_description: Four principles of confession — four monorhyming lines in a Latin sermon, Dominus hiis opus habet

CULIi38.Transcription:
Opyn wyȝt oute leyseynggehole wyȝt oute
                    lytlyggeþyn wyȝt oute eny oþer atwytinggelouȝt
                    wyȝt oute arysingge
CULIi38.Editions:
Stemmler,  Theo. 
             “More English Texts from MS. Cambridge University Library
                Ii.III.8.” 
             Anglia
         93 (1975): 1-16: 7-8.
